morning.name: Chelsea Market
morning.description: Explore diverse food vendors and grab a delicious vegetarian breakfast or brunch.

morning.name: High Line Park
morning.description: Stroll along this elevated park built on former railway lines, enjoying city views and public art installations.

afternoon.name: MoMA - Museum of Modern Art
afternoon.description: Immerse yourself in modern and contemporary art from around the world.

evening.name: Gramercy Tavern
evening.description: Enjoy a refined vegetarian dinner at this acclaimed New York restaurant.

evening.name: Blue Note Jazz Club
evening.description: Experience the vibrant New York jazz scene at this legendary club.

morning.name: Central Park
morning.description: Explore the vast greenery of Central Park, perhaps renting a bike or having a picnic.

afternoon.name: Chelsea Market
afternoon.description: Return to Chelsea Market for lunch and browse unique shops.

evening.name: Free time
evening.description: Enjoy some time to relax or explore more of the city based on your interests. Explore Greenwich Village or find a show.
